text: Denis Van Akiyama (May 28, 1952 â€“ June 28, 2018) was a Canadian actor. He was born in Toronto. He was best known for being the voice of Iceman/Bobby Drake, Silver Samurai, and Sunfire in the X-Men Animated Series and Malachite/Kunzite in the original English version of Sailor Moon. He played Shinji in Johnny Mnemonic. In 2015, he appeared in the movie Pixels as Professor Iwatani.
